title: MATCHMAKING SUCKS!!!
body:
OMG.
Riot what is up with the matchmaking systems, it's really pissing me off just like today and the past few days and weeks every single game of norms I play everyone on my team ends up feeding the enemy and I'm the only one actually with higher kills then deaths and they blame me for the loss.
I am quitting this game until it gets better, 
Thanks
RAGER

replies.body: Seems you get "r3kt m8" {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} so you better "g3t g00d m8" {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
so does your name, but I don't see that changing anytime soon.
